metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9878 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: There is an invalid memory access in the functionGfxIndexedColorSpace::mapColorToBase() located in GfxState.cc in Xpdf4.0.0, as used in pdfalto 0.2. It can be triggered by (for example) sendinga crafted pdf file to the pdftops binary. It allows an attacker to causeDenial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libextractor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
